#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
        char a[10];
        int i,dash=0;
        for(i=0;i<10;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
        for(i=0;a[i]!='\0';i++)
        {
            switch(a[i])
            {
                case '0':
                {

                    cout<<"-----";
                    dash=dash;
                break;
                }

                case '1':
                {

                    cout<<".----";
                    dash+=1;
                break;
                }
                case '2':
                {

                    cout<<"..---";
                    dash+=2;
                break;
                }
                case '3':
                {

                    cout<<"...--";
                    dash+=3;
                break;
                }
                case '4':
                {

                    cout<<"....-";
                    dash+=4;
                break;
                }
                case '5':
                {

                    cout<<".....";
                    dash+=5;
                break;
                }
                case '6':
                {

                    cout<<"-....";
                    dash+=4;
                break;
                }
                case '7':
                {

                    cout<<"--...";
                    dash+=3;
                break;
                }
                case '8':
                {

                    cout<<"---..";
                    dash+=2;
                break;
                }
                case '9':
                {

                    cout<<"----.";
                    dash+=1;
                break;
                }
        }
    }
    cout<<endl<<dash<<endl;

}
return 0;
}
